name: USDX Stablecoin Breaks From Its $1 Peg, Sliding to $0.37
description: The Bio-Saint kneels, brass anatomy failing the symmetry of the ritual platform. A sacred cyan fluid weeps from the heart’s breached core, assets dissolving instantly into the jagged, granular silence of CRT static. The algorithm has abandoned the pact.
